items.title: Auckland, NZ
items.summary:
Rare sale on Main Cabin fares to Auckland! Flying American with availability during summer in New Zealand (January - March). Nonstop from Dallas and LA.

 

These Main Cabin fares include a carry-on, checked bag, meals, seat selection, and free changes and cancellation for a voucher.
items.summaryRaw:
Rare sale on Main Cabin fares to Auckland! Flying American with availability during summer in New Zealand (January - March). Nonstop from Dallas and LA.




These Main Cabin fares include a carry-on, checked bag, meals, seat selection, and free changes and cancellation for a voucher.
items.tip: Head south to Queenstown (ZQN) from Auckland for ~$100. From there, make the trip to beautiful Milford Sound (photo above).
items.bookingInstructions:
1. Click the Book with Google Flights button to open Google Flights. (Our how-to video)

 

2. Adjust the departure city to your home airport.

 

3. Click the dates to open the calendar view to find the cheapest dates (lowest prices in green). Availability may vary depending on your home airport. 


4. Follow the links in Google Flights to book directly with the airline.

items.title: NFL Away Games
items.summary:
Important Information

 

1. These fares will likely to go up in a matter of hours. Don't wait to book!

 

2. Most of the lowest fares will be for one-week trips starting and ending on Tuesdays or Wednesdays. 


3. If your desired away game isn't listed, the price is too high to be considered "a deal." Try searching for flights to/from nearby airports to get a lower price. 

 

 

See your favorite NFL team play an away game this year! Availability this fall. Nonstop from many cities. Don't wait – these fares won't last long!

 

All fares listed are for trips including the listed game day! Most are for 7-day trips. 

United fares are Main Cabin and include a carry-on and seat assignment. Other fares are Basic Economy.
items.summaryRaw:
Important Information



1. These fares will likely to go up in a matter of hours. Don't wait to book!




2. Most of the lowest fares will be for one-week trips starting and ending on Tuesdays or Wednesdays. 


3. If your desired away game isn't listed, the price is too high to be considered "a deal." Try searching for flights to/from nearby airports to get a lower price. 





See your favorite NFL team play an away game this year! Availability this fall. Nonstop from many cities. Don't wait – these fares won't last long!




All fares listed are for trips including the listed game day! Most are for 7-day trips. 



United fares are Main Cabin and include a carry-on and seat assignment. Other fares are Basic Economy.
items.tip: Game tickets look expensive? Scour the secondary market sites like StubHub and SeatGeek to get a better deal.
items.bookingInstructions:
1. Click the Book with Google Flights button to open Google Flights. (Our how-to video)

2. Adjust the departure and destination cities to your desired city pair. 

3. Click the dates to open the calendar view to find the cheapest dates (lowest prices in green). Availability may vary depending on your home airport.
4. Follow the links in Google Flights to book directly with the airline.

items.title: Lake Tahoe
items.summary:
Schedule your summer trip to Lake Tahoe – just a 45-minute drive from Reno! Best availability through August. Nonstop from several cities. Deals work in reverse if you live in Reno.

 

United fares are Main Cabin and include a carry-on and seat assignment. Other fares are Basic Economy.
items.summaryRaw:
Schedule your summer trip to Lake Tahoe – just a 45-minute drive from Reno! Best availability through August. Nonstop from several cities. Deals work in reverse if you live in Reno.




United fares are Main Cabin and include a carry-on and seat assignment. Other fares are Basic Economy.
items.tip: Have the Venture X Card? Cover the cost of these flights when you book through the Capital One Travel Portal with your $300 travel credit.

3. Click the dates to open the calendar view to find the cheapest dates (lowest prices in green). Availability may vary depending on your home airport.


4. Follow the links in Google Flights to book directly with the airline.

items.priceSubheading: Schedule your summer trip to Lake Tahoe!

items.title: [BIZ CLASS] LAX to Tahiti
items.summary:
Rare availability to fly Air France's new business class suites nonstop from Los Angeles to Tahiti! Best availability in November & January. You'll be aboard the A350 equipped with its brand-new suites!

 

We recently flew this aircraft and had a great experience. The pod-like seats with sliding doors felt really private, the wireless charging & huge monitor were a nice touch, and the food & drinks were excellent! Read our review.


Includes priority boarding, seat assignment, checked bags, lie-flat seats with closing doors, lounge access, business class food, and champagne.

 

Book with Air France/KLM Flying Blue

 

Flying Blue charges 70k miles each way. Transfer points from Amex Membership Rewards, Bilt, Capital One, Chase, Citi, or Wells Fargo (usually instant).

 

Dates Available for 2+ Passengers

 

Los Angeles - Tahiti

  • LAX-PPT: July 8, 24; Nov. 9, 17, 19; Jan. 11, 25; Apr. 15, 27; May 6

  • PPT-LAX: July 5, 10, 12; Aug. 7, 12; Nov. 6, 22, 27; Dec. 15-16, 18, 20, 25, 27, 29; Jan. 13, 18, 22; Feb. 17; Mar. 12; Apr. 29-30; May 2, 4, 6-7
items.summaryRaw:
Rare availability to fly Air France's new business class suites nonstop from Los Angeles to Tahiti! Best availability in November & January. You'll be aboard the A350 equipped with its brand-new suites!




We recently flew this aircraft and had a great experience. The pod-like seats with sliding doors felt really private, the wireless charging & huge monitor were a nice touch, and the food & drinks were excellent! Read our review.


Includes priority boarding, seat assignment, checked bags, lie-flat seats with closing doors, lounge access, business class food, and champagne.




Book with Air France/KLM Flying Blue




Flying Blue charges 70k miles each way. Transfer points from Amex Membership Rewards, Bilt, Capital One, Chase, Citi, or Wells Fargo (usually instant).



Dates Available for 2+ Passengers



Los Angeles - Tahiti

LAX-PPT: July 8, 24; Nov. 9, 17, 19; Jan. 11, 25; Apr. 15, 27; May 6

PPT-LAX: July 5, 10, 12; Aug. 7, 12; Nov. 6, 22, 27; Dec. 15-16, 18, 20, 25, 27, 29; Jan. 13, 18, 22; Feb. 17; Mar. 12; Apr. 29-30; May 2, 4, 6-7
items.tip: Don't live in LA? Book a cheap positioning flight to Los Angeles to take advantage of this deal to fly biz class to paradise.
items.bookingInstructions:
1. Create a free Flying Blue account. You must have an account to search.

2. Log in on Air France's site, click tab "Book with miles" & "Continue."

3. We recommend viewing rates on the flexible calendar: Leave the "passenger" field as one passenger and the "departure date" field blank.

4. Choose the "Business" cabin & click "Search flights." It will be easiest to search one-way at a time.

5. Once you find your desired flights, search those exact dates with the total number of passengers to confirm availability.

 

Flying Blue's website is not the best. The flexible calendar may not always work. In these cases, try a different browser or search the exact dates listed above. Read our full guide.

 

Transfers are usually instant but in some cases there are delays. If you're just opening a new loyalty account, transfers may take longer.

 

Taxes & fees are ~$200 one-way or $450 R/T
items.departureCitiesSubheading: (All fares one-way, *nonstop) - Pricing is in Flying Blue miles
items.policies: Air France-KLM Flying Blue charges a ~$75 change/cancellation fee.
items.priceSubheading: Rare availability to fly Air France's new business class suites nonstop from Los Angeles to Tahiti!

items.title: [PREMIUM ECONOMY] Maldives
items.summary:
Travel in comfort flying Premium Economy to the Maldives! You'll be aboard the #1 airline in the world, Singapore Airlines. Availability this fall through winter.

 

Singapore Airlines Premium Economy includes 6" more legroom, wider seats, two free checked bags, seat assignment, and the fancy "Book the Cook" menu. 

 

There are no economy seats on the NYC to Singapore routes, only Premium Economy and Business Class. The cabin will feel much less congested than normal, which is important on the world's two longest flights!
items.summaryRaw:
Travel in comfort flying Premium Economy to the Maldives! You'll be aboard the #1 airline in the world, Singapore Airlines. Availability this fall through winter.




Singapore Airlines Premium Economy includes 6" more legroom, wider seats, two free checked bags, seat assignment, and the fancy "Book the Cook" menu. 




There are no economy seats on the NYC to Singapore routes, only Premium Economy and Business Class. The cabin will feel much less congested than normal, which is important on the world's two longest flights!
items.tip: Visit both Singapore and the Maldives by booking multi-city fares using Singapore's website for ~$100 more. Click "Multi-city / Stopovers" on the homepage.
items.bookingInstructions:
1. Click the Book with Google Flights button to open Google Flights. (Our how-to video)

 

2. Adjust the departure city to your home airport. 

 

3. Click the dates to open the calendar view to find the cheapest dates (lowest prices in green). Availability may vary depending on your home airport. 


4. Follow the links in Google Flights to book directly with Singapore Airlines. 

 

Flights are Premium Economy for the long-haul segment between the U.S. and Singapore, and connecting to the Maldives in Economy.

 

Note: Singapore fares will appear more expensive and may not load on Google Flights, but they will show the prices listed above on Singapore's website. Follow the "Visit site for price" link to book with Singapore.

New York (JFK) - $1596
Newark (EWR) - $1596
San Francisco (SFO) - $1496
items.policies: These Premium Economy Lite fares allow ticket changes for $100.
items.priceSubheading: Travel in comfort flying Premium Economy to the Maldives!

items.title: Brazil, Germany, & U.K.
items.summary:
Support your squad at the NFL International Games in São Paulo, London, or Munich this fall! Nonstop from several cities. Book now – These fares won't last long!

 

All fares listed are for trips including game day! Best availability for one-week trips. 

 

Fares are Basic Economy and include a carry-on. We recommend upgrading to Main Cabin to get a free checked bag and the ability to cancel for a voucher. U.S. airlines also include free seat assignment on Main Cabin tickets.
items.summaryRaw:
Support your squad at the NFL International Games in São Paulo, London, or Munich this fall! Nonstop from several cities. Book now – These fares won't last long!



All fares listed are for trips including game day! Best availability for one-week trips. 



Fares are Basic Economy and include a carry-on. We recommend upgrading to Main Cabin to get a free checked bag and the ability to cancel for a voucher. U.S. airlines also include free seat assignment on Main Cabin tickets.
items.tip: To save on some flights, look into nearby cities, too. Search for Frankfurt (FRA) flights for the Munich game, Dublin (DUB) or Amsterdam (AMS) flights for the London game, or Rio (GIG) flights for Brazil.
items.bookingInstructions:
1. Click the Book with Google Flights button to open Google Flights. (Our how-to video)

 

2. Adjust the departure city to your home airport.

 

3. Click the dates to open the calendar view to find the cheapest dates (lowest prices in green). Availability may vary depending on your home airport. 


4. Follow the links in Google Flights to book directly with the airline. 

 

Use custom links for each game for best results.

items.title: [BIZ CLASS] Amsterdam & Paris
items.summary:
Unicorn Fare

 

We’ve never seen this much availability to fly Air France/KLM biz class to Europe for 50k miles each way - especially over peak summer, including Olympics! Book ASAP, it won’t last long!

 

 

Wide-open peak summer award space to fly lie-flat biz class seats to Europe via Flying Blue! Nonstop to Paris & Amsterdam on Air France or KLM - or connect onward throughout Europe. Best availability for 2+ passengers in June - August, inc'l the Olympics (July 26 - Aug. 11). Some dates for up to 9 passengers.


Air France’s brand-new suites are on its newer 777s & A350s. To be certain you’re flying the suites, look for 14 rows of biz class on the seat map. On other aircraft, you’ll still be flying in a great seat - read our review flying the older A350.

KLM's best seats are flying its 787 Dreamliner and refurbished 777s (with sliding doors). Look for 9 rows of biz class in a 1-2-1 layout to ensure you're flying a newer 777. KLM's older 777s and A330s have less comfy 2-2-2 seating.

 

Includes priority boarding, seat assignment, checked bags, lie-flat seats, lounge access, business class food, and champagne.

 

Book with Air France/KLM Flying Blue

 

Flying Blue charges 50k miles each way. Taxes & fees are $200 one-way or ~$500 R/T. Transfer points from Amex Membership Rewards, Bilt, Capital One, Chase, Citi, or Wells Fargo (usually instant).
items.summaryRaw:
Unicorn Fare



We’ve never seen this much availability to fly Air France/KLM biz class to Europe for 50k miles each way - especially over peak summer, including Olympics! Book ASAP, it won’t last long!





Wide-open peak summer award space to fly lie-flat biz class seats to Europe via Flying Blue! Nonstop to Paris & Amsterdam on Air France or KLM - or connect onward throughout Europe. Best availability for 2+ passengers in June - August, inc'l the Olympics (July 26 - Aug. 11). Some dates for up to 9 passengers.


Air France’s brand-new suites are on its newer 777s & A350s. To be certain you’re flying the suites, look for 14 rows of biz class on the seat map. On other aircraft, you’ll still be flying in a great seat - read our review flying the older A350.

KLM's best seats are flying its 787 Dreamliner and refurbished 777s (with sliding doors). Look for 9 rows of biz class in a 1-2-1 layout to ensure you're flying a newer 777. KLM's older 777s and A330s have less comfy 2-2-2 seating.




Includes priority boarding, seat assignment, checked bags, lie-flat seats, lounge access, business class food, and champagne.




Book with Air France/KLM Flying Blue




Flying Blue charges 50k miles each way. Taxes & fees are $200 one-way or ~$500 R/T. Transfer points from Amex Membership Rewards, Bilt, Capital One, Chase, Citi, or Wells Fargo (usually instant).
items.tip: Connect onward to other cities in Europe for the same price. Add a free stopover if you book over the phone via Flying Blue.
items.bookingInstructions:
Booking with Flying Blue

 

1. Create a free Flying Blue account. You must have an account to search.

2. Log in on Air France's site, click tab "Book with miles" & "Continue."

3. We recommend viewing rates on the flexible calendar: Leave the "passenger" field as one passenger and the "departure date" field blank.

4. Choose the "Business" cabin & click "Search flights." It will be easiest to search one-way at a time.

5. Once you find your desired flights, search those exact dates with the total number of passengers to confirm availability.

 

When choosing flights, click "flight details" to know which aircraft you'll be flying and check the seat map to verify the seating layout.

 

Flying Blue's website is not the best. The flexible calendar may not always work. In these cases, try a different browser or KLM's website. If you get errors at checkout, call Flying Blue (800-375-8723) to finish booking. Read our full guide.

items.title: [Delta SkyMiles] Banff Nat'l Park
items.summary:
Explore the Canadian Rockies using your SkyMiles! Flying Delta and its partner WestJet with the best availability through summer. Nonstop from several cities. Deals work in reverse if you live in Calgary.

Fares are Main Cabin, which includes a carry-on and free online cancellation. Seat selection starts from $11 on WestJet flights.
items.summaryRaw:
Explore the Canadian Rockies using your SkyMiles! Flying Delta and its partner WestJet with the best availability through summer. Nonstop from several cities. Deals work in reverse if you live in Calgary.

Fares are Main Cabin, which includes a carry-on and free online cancellation. Seat selection starts from $11 on WestJet flights.
items.tip: We were just in Banff! Check out the Rundle Bar at the Fairmont Banff Springs for happy hour and Three Bears Brewery for local beer and great pizza.
items.bookingInstructions:
1. Search on Delta's website by selecting "Shop with Miles."

2. After searching, choose "Price Calendar" to maximize the dates viewable.

3. Filter for "Nonstop" when searching the nonstop routes listed.

 

Read our guide to booking Delta SkyMiles deals. 

 

For seat assignment on WestJet, you’ll need to contact Delta (we prefer messaging) to get the WestJet confirmation code. Then, enter that code on WestJet’s website to pick seats for a fee. Or, choose seats for free at check-in.

 

Taxes and fees are ~$65 R/T

items.title: [BIZ CLASS] Portugal & Cape Verde
items.summary:
Book these incredibly cheap lie-flat seats to Portugal, the Portuguese Islands, and Cape Verde! Best availability this fall, including Canadian and American Thanksgiving from Toronto and Boston respectively. 

 

You'll be flying TAP's A321neo with staggered 2-2 and 1-1 seating layout on the transatlantic flights. We recommend booking the "throne seats" in rows 2 and 4. Check out this seat map.

 

Includes lie-flat seats, priority boarding, checked bags, seat assignment, and tasty meals/drinks.
items.summaryRaw:
Book these incredibly cheap lie-flat seats to Portugal, the Portuguese Islands, and Cape Verde! Best availability this fall, including Canadian and American Thanksgiving from Toronto and Boston respectively. 




You'll be flying TAP's A321neo with staggered 2-2 and 1-1 seating layout on the transatlantic flights. We recommend booking the "throne seats" in rows 2 and 4. Check out this seat map.




Includes lie-flat seats, priority boarding, checked bags, seat assignment, and tasty meals/drinks.
items.tip: Add a Lisbon stopover for almost exactly the same price as the roundtrip! Take your desired dates to TAP's Stopover site to book.
items.bookingInstructions:
1. Click the Book with Google Flights button to open Google Flights. (Our how-to video)

 

2. Adjust the departure city to your home airport.

 

3. Click the dates to open the calendar view to find the cheapest dates (lowest prices in green). Availability may vary depending on your home airport.


4. Follow the links in Google Flights to book directly with TAP Air Portugal.
items.policies: Changes to these TAP Executive fares are $300. Cancellation fees are $250.
items.priceSubheading: Book these incredibly cheap lie-flat seats to Portugal!

items.title: Tucson, AZ
items.summary:
Up for a trip to the Arizona desert? Best availability this fall – including Labor Day from several cities. Nonstop from L.A. and Seattle. Deals work in reverse if you live in Tucson.

 

Fares are Basic Economy and include a carry-on. We recommend upgrading to Main Cabin to get a seat assignment and the ability to cancel for a voucher.
items.summaryRaw:
Up for a trip to the Arizona desert? Best availability this fall – including Labor Day from several cities. Nonstop from L.A. and Seattle. Deals work in reverse if you live in Tucson.




Fares are Basic Economy and include a carry-on. We recommend upgrading to Main Cabin to get a seat assignment and the ability to cancel for a voucher.
items.tip: Take a scenic drive through Saguaro National Park and see the famous Saguaro cacti (pictured) up close!
items.bookingInstructions:
1. Click the Book with Google Flights button to open Google Flights. (Our how-to video)

 

2. Adjust the departure city to your home airport.

 

3. Click the dates to open the calendar view to find the cheapest dates (lowest prices in green). Availability may vary depending on your home airport.


4. Follow the links in Google Flights to book directly with the airline.
